item.title: HP ILO - Quickly gather ILO version and firmware information via CURL
item.description: Have a lot of HP servers with ILO cards, and want to gather information from them quicly? By default you can get some information in XML format, for ILO, ILO2, ILO3 and ILO4, with curl.
